samples.source: The incident occurred on the A9 north of Berriedale in Caithness at about 14:00. Several other people received minor injuries in the crash. The road was closed and diversions were put in place via the A897 Helmsdale to Melvich road. Police Scotland said inquiries into the incident were ongoing.
samples.summary: The passage describes an incident that took place on the A9 north of Berriedale in Caithness at around 14:00. Multiple individuals sustained minor injuries in the crash. As a result, the road was closed and alternative routes were established via the A897 Helmsdale to Melvich road. Police Scotland is currently conducting investigations into the incident.

samples.source: The incident occurred on the A9 north of Berriedale in Caithness at about 14:00. Several other people received minor injuries in the crash. The road was closed and diversions were put in place via the A897 Helmsdale to Melvich road. Police Scotland said inquiries into the incident were ongoing.
samples.summary: The incident happened on the A9 north of Berriedale in Caithness at around 14:00, resulting in several people sustaining minor injuries. The road was closed, and diversions were set up via the A897 Helmsdale to Melvich road. Police Scotland stated that investigations into the incident are ongoing.
